participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, Emily is passionate about cooking and values her relationships with family.
participant_1.background: I wake up early to make breakfast for my brother before he leaves for the army. My favorite animal is the koala. I am a chef. I don't have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends as soccer in the fall. I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Introverted and contemplative, Jake finds comfort in solitude and values deep connections with a few close friends.
participant_2.background: I'm a loner who likes to spend time with my dog. I value monogamy in a relationship. I love getting my favorite coffee from Starbucks after a long day at the lab. I like the Flintstones. I am constantly drinking.

content.text: I'm doing pretty good, how about you?
Not too bad, a little tired. I just finished making breakfast for my brother before he left for the army.
Oh wow, that's really nice of you.
Thanks, it's what I do. I'm a chef and I love to cook.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a chef, but I don't think I have the patience.
It takes a lot of hard work, but it's definitely worth it.
I'm sure it is. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making breakfast foods, like eggs and pancakes. But I also love making pasta dishes.
Pasta is my favorite! I love making pasta dishes too.
That's awesome! We should cook together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm always up for trying new recipes.
Great! We can trade recipes and cook together.
